languages.text: {n}Трагический мор среди астропатов не повторился, но все они докладывали, что слышат странные шепоты с первого дня, проведенного на планете.{/n}
{n}There has been no recurrence of the disastrous Astropathic madness, but the new Astropaths have all reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Трагический мор среди астропатов не повторился, но все они докладывали, что слышат странные шепоты с первого дня, проведенного на планете.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The tragic pestilence of the Astropaths did not happen again, but all of them have reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}
{n}The tragic pestilence of the Astropaths did not happen again, but all of them have reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}
{n}There has been no recurrence of the disastrous Astropathic madness, but the new Astropaths have all reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}
{n}The tragic pestilence of the Astropaths has not appeared again, but all of them have reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}
{n}The tragic pestilence of the Astropaths has not appeared again, but all of them have reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}
{n}There has been no recurrence of the disastrous Astropathic madness, but the new Astropaths have all reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}
{n}There has been no recurrence of the disastrous Astropathic madness, but the new Astropaths have all reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}
{n}There has been no recurrence of the disastrous Astropathic madness, but the new Astropaths have all reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}星语者发疯的灾难性事故没有再次爆发，但所有新来的星语者都报告称，自从他们来到达戈努斯的第一天起，就听到了某些古怪的低语。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There has been no recurrence of the disastrous Astropathic madness, but the new Astropaths have all reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}星语者发疯的灾难性事故没有再次爆发，但所有新来的星语者都报告称，自从他们来到达戈努斯的第一天起，就听到了某些古怪的低语。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La calamitosa locura de los Astrópatas no ha vuelto a repetirse, pero los nuevos Astrópatas afirman escuchar susurros extraños desde su llegada al planeta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There has been no recurrence of the disastrous Astropathic madness, but the new Astropaths have all reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La calamitosa locura de los Astrópatas no ha vuelto a repetirse, pero los nuevos Astrópatas afirman escuchar susurros extraños desde su llegada al planeta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}感応通信官の悲劇的な発狂が再び起こることはなかったが、新しい感応通信官はこの惑星での最初の日以降、奇妙なささやき声を聞いたとその全員が報告している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There has been no recurrence of the disastrous Astropathic madness, but the new Astropaths have all reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}感応通信官の悲劇的な疫病が再び現れることはなかったが、この惑星での最初の日以降、奇妙なささやき声を聞いたとその全員が報告している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La folie désastreuse des astropathes ne réapparaît pas, mais les nouveaux astropathes signalent tous avoir entendu d'étranges murmures dès leur arrivée sur la planète.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There has been no recurrence of the disastrous Astropathic madness, but the new Astropaths have all reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La folie désastreuse des astropathes ne réapparaît pas, mais les nouveaux astropathes signalent tous avoir entendu d'étranges murmures dès leur arrivée sur la planète.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der verheerende astropathische Wahnsinn kehrte nicht zurück, aber die neuen Astropathen hören seit ihrem ersten Tag auf dem Planeten allesamt ein seltsames Flüstern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There has been no recurrence of the disastrous Astropathic madness, but the new Astropaths have all reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der verheerende astropathische Wahnsinn kehrte nicht zurück, aber die neuen Astropathen hören seit ihrem ersten Tag auf dem Planeten allesamt ein seltsames Flüstern.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Astropatların yakalandığı delilik felaketi, bir kez daha vuku bulmadı. Ancak yeni Astropatların hepsi, gezegendeki ilk günlerinden itibaren tuhaf fısıltılar duyduğunu raporladı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There has been no recurrence of the disastrous Astropathic madness, but the new Astropaths have all reported hearing strange whispers ever since their first day on the planet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Astropatların yakalandığı delilik felaketi, bir kez daha vuku bulmadı. Ancak yeni Astropatların hepsi, gezegendeki ilk günlerinden itibaren tuhaf fısıltılar duyduğunu raporladı.{/n}
